quotes.text: Fact: LBY can solve any problem... by leaving.
Only 26 days until we finally get to use that quiet conference room!
Fact: LBY's last day is marked in 3 different calendars... just to be sure.
Breaking News: Local company discovers they actually CAN function without LBY.
Fact: LBY invented the art of 'the strategic last-minute email'.
Only 22 days until the office Slack channel becomes slightly less chaotic.
Fact: LBY's departure will be the most well-documented event in company history.
Scientists estimate oxygen levels will normalize within days of LBY's exit.
Fact: LBY has mastered the 'mysterious meeting' where nobody knows what happened.
Only 18 days until someone else gets blamed for missing deadlines.
Fact: LBY could probably leave the country undetected at this point.
Breaking: New intern already preparing to fill the void (impossible mission).
Fact: LBY's last day countdown is now more important than national holidays.
Halfway there! Only 14 more days of LBY's legendary productivity!
Fact: LBY invented at least 3 new coffee machine techniques nobody else understands.
Office betting pool now at record high for 'Last LBY Sighting' predictions.
Fact: LBY's email signatures have evolved more than most people's careers.
Only 11 days until we remember what Tuesday mornings are supposed to be like.
Fact: LBY has attended more meetings than most people have attended days.
News Alert: Office supply budget expected to decrease by 40% post-LBY.
Fact: LBY's desk is a time capsule of organizational mystery.
Only 7 days until the legend walks into sunset... finally.
Fact: LBY has perfected the art of the strategic 'out of office' message.
Meteorologists report a high pressure system forming on March 5th (goodbye zone).
Fact: LBY's farewell speech will probably be delivered via email at 5:01 PM.
Only 2 days until we all pretend to be sad while secretly dancing.
Fact: This countdown app is the longest project anyone's completed this month.
IT'S TODAY! LBY is officially LEAVING! Freedom! Adventure! Chaos without management!
